FuncDef: The display inventory port command displays information about interfaces on an existing device.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
An Installed Base Management System (IBMS) is a system that Huawei GTS AMS developed to manage inventory devices on a live network. With customer's approval, the IBMS periodically collects live network statistics and provides real-time and effective data. The display inventory port command displays information about interfaces on an existing device.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
The command output varies according to the product type and board specifications.
